messages.message:
Xiangmiao
Long time no see  How have you guys been? Really miss the crazy cook out days. Glad it is still going. 
My hubby and I and a friend are going to Southern Utah July 1st to 3rd. Maybe you guys can come up and have a crazy cook out in one of the national parks 

We are planning on start from zion's, which is only a couple of hours away from Flagstaff. It is going to be really fun hiking/camping if you guys can make it. 

Xiangmiao ^o^

Michael
Hey! Long time no see!  Yeah I'll talk with the group,  I think its a great idea.

David
I'm up for a trip to Zion next weekend! But I can't take time off work because of all of my other July trips, so I have to be back Sunday night. So we might only overlap a little bit in that case. 

Xiangmiao, when do you get into Zion?

Xiangmiao
Sunday around noon. We can meet up with you in the afternoon. Call me or text me. 928/679-5552, same old number
